title: H. Your Rights to Your Personal Data
subtitle: 7.1 Payment Policy
intro: You have the following rights with respect to your personal data:
list: The right to request a copy of the data that Sygence possesses.
The right to request that Sygence corrects your personal data if inaccurate or out of date.
The right to request that your personal data is deleted when it is no longer necessary for Sygence to retain such data.
The right to withdraw any consent to personal data processing at any time. For example, your consent to receive e-marketing communications.
The right to access, review, add, rectify, modify, correct, delete or update your Customer Information or other personal information at any time.
The right to object to the processing of your personal information.
footer: If you wish to exercise your rights, e.g., you believe that the information we hold about you is inaccurate or if you believe that we are no longer entitled to use it and want to request its rectification, deletion or object to its processing, please contact us at info@sygence.one . We will provide you with the information you have sought by email or, if possible, in another form that you have requested. To protect your privacy, we may ask you to verify your identity or provide additional information before we let you access or update your information. We may reject requests for certain reasons, including if the request is unlawful or if it may infringe on trade secrets, intellectual property or the privacy of another user.
